about_the_game:
This Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2.

  • The professional license allows to use screenshots and videos for commercial usage.
  • Set custom friction parameters in the coaster properties.
  • Password protect your park packages.
  • Import and Export the track spline (points along a track) from and to a CSV file.
  • Unrestricted Video Export resolutions (up to 4k, no watermark)
  • 360 degree (Equirectangular) Video Export
  • High quality motion-blur effect in Video Export
  • High resolution poster screenshots
  • Transparent background screenshots (screenshots with alpha)
  • Debug Information Panel
  • Import/Export of supports in custom XML format
  • Import/Export of scenery in custom XML format


Note: This DLC is not required if you already have purchased the Professional License Upgrade from our website.

Note: The spline import/export files cannot be directly loaded into other 3D applications. It is a custom format that stores position and orientation vectors of the track and does not include any 3d geometry data. Therefore this DLC is not a solution for easy 3d printing. There currently is no soluation available to export any 3d geometry for 3d printing.
detailed_description:
This Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2.

  • The professional license allows to use screenshots and videos for commercial usage.
  • Set custom friction parameters in the coaster properties.
  • Password protect your park packages.
  • Import and Export the track spline (points along a track) from and to a CSV file.
  • Unrestricted Video Export resolutions (up to 4k, no watermark)
  • 360 degree (Equirectangular) Video Export
  • High quality motion-blur effect in Video Export
  • High resolution poster screenshots
  • Transparent background screenshots (screenshots with alpha)
  • Debug Information Panel
  • Import/Export of supports in custom XML format
  • Import/Export of scenery in custom XML format


Note: This DLC is not required if you already have purchased the Professional License Upgrade from our website.

Note: The spline import/export files cannot be directly loaded into other 3D applications. It is a custom format that stores position and orientation vectors of the track and does not include any 3d geometry data. Therefore this DLC is not a solution for easy 3d printing. There currently is no soluation available to export any 3d geometry for 3d printing.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible (Intel HD Graphics or better) with 512 MB VRam
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel GMA graphics not supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or newer, 64 Bit supported
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible discrete Radeon or better graphics with 1GB VRam
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Discrete Radeon or better graphics highly recommended

name: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional License

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional Features - $54.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional License

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.0 hardware required (>= Shader Model 3), min 512 MB VRAM, older DX9 cards (ATI x1000 series, GF 7000 series or older) not supported
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Good graphics card is very important. Some integrated graphics solutions might be too slow.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 hardware or newer (>= Shader Model 5) and with 1 GB or more VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GeForce GTX 550 or AMD Radeon 7750 or better recommended.

short_description: The Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation and unlock restrictions of the standard license. The added features were designed to help professionals working in the amusement park industry.
